Package com.david.Controller

Class CourseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.david.Controller.CourseController

  • @Controller
public class CourseController
extends Object
    This controller handles incoming requests concerning the courses.
    Author:
    Marius Buerck

    • Method Detail

      • courses

        @GetMapping("/courses")
public String courses​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                      @RequestParam(defaultValue="0")
                      int page)
        This controller method handles get-requests to "/courses". It responds with an index view of the courses.
        Parameters:
        model - The model used in Thymeleaf templating.
        page - Page number of the currently displayed page.
        Returns:
        The "courses"-view.

      • createCourse

        @PostMapping("/courses/create")
public String createCourse​(@Valid
                           @Valid Course course,
                           org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        This controller method handles post-requests to "/courses/create". It is responsible for creating courses. It responds with a redirect to "/courses"
        Parameters:
        course - The course to be created.
        result - The BindingResult used for error checking.
        Returns:
        A redirect to "/courses".

      • updateCourse

        @PostMapping("/courses/update")
public String updateCourse​(@Valid
                           @Valid Course course,
                           org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        This controller methods handles post-requests to "/courses/update". It is responsible for handling changes to courses. It responds with a redirect to "/courses".
        Parameters:
        course - The course to be changed.
        result - The BindingResult used for error checking.
        Returns:
        A redirect to "/courses".

      • deleteCourse

        @GetMapping("/courses/delete/")
public String deleteCourse​(@RequestParam("id")
                           String id)
        This controller method handles get-requests to "/courses/delete". It is responsible for delete courses. It redirects to "/courses".
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the course to be deleted.
        Returns:
        A redirect to "/courses".

      • coursesRaw

        @GetMapping("/courses/raw")
@ResponseBody
public Iterable<Course> coursesRaw​()
        This controller method handles get-requests to "/courses/raw/". It responds with a list courses.
        Returns:
        An iterable containing courses.

      • findCourseById

        @GetMapping("/courses/find/")
@ResponseBody
public Course findCourseById​(long id)
        This controller method handles get-requests to "/courses/find/". It find course by id and return it.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the searched course
        Returns:
        Course
